node_2: petty officer second class doris miller
edge: Cuba Gooding Jr. portrays Petty Officer Second Class Doris Miller, a messman aboard the USS West Virginia who operated anti-aircraft guns during the attack on Pearl Harbor.

node_2: commander-in-chief of the united states fleet and the u.s. pacific fleet.
edge: Colm Feore portrays Admiral Husband E. Kimmel, the commander-in-chief of the United States Fleet and the U.S. Pacific Fleet.
Mako portrays Kaigun Taishō (admiral) Isoroku Yamamoto, Fleet Admiral of the Imperial Japanese Navy and mastermind of the attack on Pearl Harbor.
Alec Baldwin portrays Major (later Lieutenant Colonel) Jimmy Doolittle, USAF commander and leader of the Doolittle Raid.
Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa portrays Kaigun Chūsa (commander) Minoru Genda, lead planner of the attack on Pearl Harbor.
Scott Wilson portrays General George C. Marshall, the US Army's Chief of Staff.
Graham Beckel portrays Admiral Chester W. Nimitz, a US Naval commander who later succeeded Kimmel as the Pacific Fleet's Commander-in-Chief.
Tomas Arana portrays Rear-Admiral Frank Jack Fletcher, Commander Cruiser Division Four.
Peter Firth portrays Captain Mervyn S. Bennion, commanding officer of the USS West Virginia
Glenn Morshower portrays Vice Admiral William Halsey Jr., commander of Carrier Division 2 and the Aircraft Battle Force.
Yuji Okumoto portrays Kaigun-Daii (Lieutenant) Zenji Abe (1916-2007), bomber pilot in the attack on Pearl Harbor.
Madison Mason portrays Admiral Raymond A. Spruance, commander of Cruiser Division Five.
Madison Mason portrayed Admiral Raymond A. Spruance, a prominent naval officer during World War II, in this production.
In this context, 'Commander of Cruiser Division Five' refers to the military position held by Admiral Raymond A. Spruance.
In this production, Michael Shamus Wiles played the role of Captain Marc Mitscher, a naval officer who served as the captain of the USS Hornet during World War II.
During World War II, Captain Marc Mitscher served as the commander of the USS Hornet, a naval aircraft carrier.
In this production, Seth Sakai portrayed Takeo Yoshikawa, a Japanese spy who played a significant role in the Attack on Pearl Harbor.
